mapper.select: select * from UO_WEIGHT_INDEX_CONFIG where PERIOD_TYPE = #{periodType} AND INDEX_TYPE=#{kpiCode} order by PERIOD_ID asc

SELECT DAY_SHORT_NAME PERIOD_ID, INDEX_VALUE FROM W_DATE D JOIN UO_WEIGHT_INDEX_CONFIG C ON D.WEEKDAY = C.PERIOD_ID WHERE C.PERIOD_TYPE = 'D' AND C.INDEX_TYPE=#{kpiCode} AND D.MONTH_SHORT_NAME = #{month} ORDER BY D.ROW_WID ASC
